page.title: 17HEALTH IN CURY/GUNWALLOE
page.content: There are no Doctors or Dentists Surgeries in the Cury or Gunwalloe area. The nearest surgeries are at Mullion where there is a Clinic staffed by four doctors and four nurses. The majority of people who live in the area belong to the above Health Centre. There is a Family Planning Clinic run by the Doctors and nursing staff. Three of the nurses act as District Nurses in the area, also the doctors visit those unable to come to the surgery. The general health of the people in the area is comparatively good. There are a number of retired people living in the area which does place a slight burden on the Social and Medical services. The low density of population in the area is a factor in the relatively healthy people in the area; another is their occupations, i.e. farming.
